text:
Suade (https://suade.org) • ONSITE (London, UK) • Front-end Software Engineer • Full time

We're bringing banks and regulators closer together with the help of technology. Join us and build the UI and visualizations needed by some of the most important institutions in the world. We use AngularJS, D3 and more for this challenging task. More details: https://suade.org/jobs/front-end-picasso/ Send your CV and a short intro to: jobs@suade.org
